name: rrxtopon
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)))))

stmt.origin: sylib(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)))), wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps))
stmt.pretty: sylib(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(TopOn `(Base `(RR^ ` c0))), (RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)))))

body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈(TopOn `(Base `(RR^ ` c0))))
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 →(RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp)
⊣ ((RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp ↔ c2 ∈(TopOn `(Base `(RR^ ` c0))))

stmt.origin: istps(cfv(crrx, c0), c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)))))

-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c0)))

⊣ (Base `(RR^ ` c0))=(Base `(RR^ ` c0))
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen `(RR^ ` c0))
